member.name: M:Fake.IISExpress.HostWebsite(Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpFunc{Fake.IISExpress.IISExpressOptions,Fake.IISExpress.IISExpressOptions},System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary:
This task starts the given site in IISExpress with the given ConfigFile. ## Parameters
- `setParams` - Function used to overwrite the default parameters. - `configFileName` - The file name of the IISExpress configfile. - `siteId` - The id (in the config file) of the website to run.
## Sample
HostWebsite (fun p -> { p with ToolPath = "iisexpress.exe" }) "configfile.config" 1
